explanation: In order to complete the task of putting a bowl with a spoon in the sink, we would need a Spoon and one of the Bowls found in the environment. The Ladles, Pot, Spatula, Knife, Plate, Glassbottle, Fork, Kettle, Lettuce, Cup, SaltShaker, PepperShaker, ButterKnife, Apple, Pan, Bread, CellPhone, DishSponge, Tomato, Mug, SoapBottle, Egg, and Potato are not necessary to complete the task.
